citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live birds.
citations.narrative:
While the primary enclosures used to transport raptors feature ventilation openings, they do not comprise an adequate
surface area of the enclosure walls. Inadequate ventilation during transport may compromise respiration and cause undue
stress. When featured on 2 walls, ventilation openings must comprise at least 16% of the total surface area of each such
wall; when featured on 4 walls, openings must comprise 8% of the total surface area of each such wall.
Correct by September 6, 2024, or prior to transport.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted at a New York State Fair exhibition. The inspection and exit interview
were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.162(b)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live birds. 
While the primary enclosures used to transport raptors feature ventilation openings, they do not comprise an adequate 
surface area of the enclosure walls. Inadequate ventilation during transport may compromise respiration and cause undue 
stress. When featured on 2 walls, ventilation openings must comprise at least 16% of the total surface area of each such 
wall; when featured on 4 walls, openings must comprise 8% of the total surface area of each such wall.  
 
Correct by September 6, 2024, or prior to transport. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted at a New York State Fair exhibition. The inspection and exit interview 
were conducted with a facility representative.
